通过 URL 路径执行查询、变更或操作函数。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"请求"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"functionIdentifier","in":"path","description":"函数路径，如 messages/list","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]} />
